message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take the bigger share this time!
You can't have it all, I'll give you a slightly bigger share this time!
You're getting desperate, take what's left!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of options, take the scraps!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're almost out of money, take the last crumbs!
I'll give you the bigger share, but don't think you're getting everything!
